welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Hoboken, Belgium! Known for its quaint streets, delicious chocolate, and warm hospitality, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the unique culture and beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Brussels Airport, used for long-haul and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
